messages.title: Affordable Housing
messages.content: I stand for building 500,000 Affordable Homes.

messages.title: Get It Tough
messages.content: We get tough on big business so you can get a fair deal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building 500,000 new homes that are affordable.

issues.economy: Getting tough on big business to ensure fairness.
issues.environment: Stopping the runways and working for cleaner, safer streets.
issues.health: Against NHS privatization and want NHS fully funded.
issues.socialWelfare: Support the idea people with disabilities deserve to live, not just survive.

housing.content: Building 500,000 new homes that are affordable.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will do all I can to help build a society that is green and fair.

quotes.text: We get tough on big business so you can get a fair deal.
quotes.date: During the campaign for the May 7 election

images.caption: Alick Munro holding a sign: 500,000 Affordable Homes
